* Thu Feb 21 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.8
- Some race condition bugs fixed

* Sat Feb 02 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.7
- Permissions changed 

* Wed Jan 30 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.6
- Debug statements are excluded
- Errorneus changing quota on race condition fixed 

* Tue Jan 29 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.5

- Interfaces changed

- Enumeration of quota logic changed

* Sun Jan 27 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.4

- Bug with root quota fixed

- Root quota reindex changed 

* Sun Jan 27 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.3

- It Used On Real Site;

- Quota can be use only as statistic now;

- Histogram and statistic reddisgned;

- There are muliquota dispatcher

- Quota may be annotation of contaner and limit its content

- Quota use IRecordSize adapter to calculate any object size. No special 
  customizing and write any adapters need any more;
  
- Some statistic parameters added;  

* Wed Nov 7 2007 Andrey Orlov <cray@neural.ru> 0.0.2
- first official release
